name: Offbeat Kerala
description:
Kerala, popularly called as “God’s Own Country”, has all its reasons to be called as such. Located on the south-west region of India, Kerala has also been referred to as one of the ‘50 Must See Destinations of a Lifetime’ and ‘10 Paradises on the World’. Well, the reason why Kerala is bestowed with all these titles can be understood only after someone lands up in Kerala.

While the backwaters of Kerala can relax your mind with an ease, the spice plantations can enrich your appetite in just a blink of an eye. The evergreen river islands, luxuriant coconut plantations and the stately houseboats dwelling on the backwaters clutch the divine capability to make your tour, one of the memorable tours of your life.

This tour package has been designed in a way, which is perfect for all age groups and covers up all the above-mentioned aspects of Kerala. In addition, this tour package will ensure you the maximum opportunity to experience Kerala’s pristine outlook.
